title: Executive HRBP
tagsAndSkills: Offer Generation,Hiring,Interviewing,Bulk Hiring,Job Portals,Video Editing,Content Creation,Lateral Hiring
jobDescription:
Job Description
Job Title: Executive - HR Business Partner
Reporting to: Manager HRBP Division: Human Resources
Supervisory Responsibilities: Nil Location: Thane


Job Summary:
The HR Business Partner (HRBP) position is responsible for aligning business objectives with employees and management in designated business units. The position formulates partnerships across the HR function to deliver value-added service to management and employees that reflects the business objectives of the organization.


Duties/Responsibilities:
• Conducts weekly meetings with respective business units.
• Consults with line management, providing HR guidance when appropriate.
• Analyzes trends and metrics in partnership with the HR group to develop solutions, programs and policies.
• Manages and resolves complex employee relations issues. Conducts effective, thorough and
objective investigations.
• Works closely with management and employees to improve work relationships, build morale, and increase productivity and retention.
• Provides HR policy guidance and interpretation.
• Develops contract terms for new hires, promotions and transfers.
• Responsible for entire employee life cycle
• Monthly Attrition analysis, action planning to track and arrest undesirable attrition.
• Employee onboarding, PIP & Absconding process
• Deployment of Skip, EWS, FGD, HR Connect and other employee retention tools
• Ensure completion of Exit formalities including Clearances, Exit Interview & F & F settlements within the set TAT.
• Champion various HR process interventions in Performance Effectiveness Program, Rewards and Recognition and Employee development/engagement initiatives.
• POSH & other statutory compliance
• Create Job Descriptions and Goals of employees in consultation with respective functional
leaders/Managers.
• IJP end to end process management for the BU
• Identifies training needs for business units and individual executive coaching needs.
• Performs other related duties as assigned.


Required Skills/Abilities:
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Experience in Employer Branding, Employer Communication and Video Creation.

Nice to have some experience using Canva or some graphic designing experience .

Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills. Stakeholder management
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to comprehend, interpret, and apply the appropriate sections of applicable laws, guidelines, regulations, ordinances, and policies.
Ability to acquire a thorough understanding of the organization's hierarchy, jobs, qualifications,
compensation practices, and the administrative practices related to those factors.
Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.


Educational Qualifications: Graduate / MBA/Postgraduate in Human Resources (2 Years fulltime)
Work Experience: Minimum of 1-3 years of experience resolving complex employee relations issues. Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including compensation practices, organizational diagnosis, employee and union relations, diversity, performance management, and federal and state respective employment laws.


Prerequisites:
• Shift Timing- 2:00 to 11:30 PM
• Prior work experience in MNC & matrix organization.
• IT/ITES, Background Verification Industry is an advantage

If you're from Thane, Mira Road, or Navi Mumbai, you might just be our perfect fit. Transport drop facilities available.

ambitionBoxData.Title: Itm Edutech Training Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
ITM Skills University


ITM Group of Institutions brings its 31 years leadership in higher education, skill development and employment generation under a single umbrella through the launch of ITM Skills University. Over the last 3 decades, ITM Group has grown into a multi-disciplinary, employment focused higher education brand, offering diverse skill and technology focused graduate and undergraduate programs.



REQUIRED


ITM Skills University Mumbai, a part of ITM Group of Institutions, invites application from interested candidates for teaching and administrative positions at our Campus in Navi Mumbai


ACADEMIC POSITIONS

  • Full Time Faculty/ Adjunct Faculty/ Visiting Faculty required in the area of Engineering, Management, Life Science
  • Qualification & Experience as per UGC and approving authority

ADMINISTRATIVE POSITIONS

  • Librarian:

Candidate with 10+years experience in managing Library responsibility

Qualification: First Class M.Lib are eligible to apply

  • Training & Placement Manager:

Candidates with 3-4 years experience in managing placement activities

  • Academic Co-Ordinator:

Graduate with Min.5 Years experience in Academic Administration

  • Marketing Executives/ Counselor:

Graduate with Min.5 Years experience in Sales & marketing of Academic Programs


  • Interested candidates should email their resume to careers@itm.edu
  • Please mention Job position in the subject line
  • Campus: ITM Skills University, Navi Mumbai Plot 25 & 26, Institutional Area, Sector 4, Kharghar, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 410210
  • Tel.: 8433711473 website: https://isu.ac.in/about-us/

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

  • Business Development for Civil Infra projects.
  • Business development and market penetration action plan for the defined sectors, product lines with approval strategies for short term (tactics) midterm and long term performances.
  • To develop projects UPSTEAM with consultants, engineers and project owners/clients.
  • Prepare industry, market and competitive analysis and report every quarter or as needed.
  • Focus on strong brand building and goodwill creation both internal and external, and ensure sustainability of business plan through a differentiation positioning strategy.
  • Overall responsibility of business monitoring and project co-ordination with BD Manager.
  • To ensure sales target achievement in co-ordination with Managers / Regional officers / engineers
  • Interacting with decision makers, business partners and key influences to strategically manage beneficial and profitable associations.
  • Preparing presentations for the clients/consultants, receiving source approval/Pre-Qualification for Major orders.
  • Understand the Indian contract laws with the help of in-depth study including FIDIC

  • Developing Client Rating Matrix

title: Automobile Sales Executive
tagsAndSkills: Sales,Automobile Components,Auto Ancillary,Trucks,Automotive Sales,parts sales,Bus,Cranes

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
As an Automobile Sales Executive, your role involves connecting with potential customers, understanding their preferences, and guiding them through the car-buying process. Heres a concise job description for this position:


Job Description

Role Overview: An Automobile Sales Executive serves as the primary point of contact between the dealership and customers. Your mission is to sell and promote a range of vehicles while ensuring exceptional customer satisfaction.

Responsibilities:

  • Greet customers arriving at the dealership.
  • Accompany customers on test drives.
  • Collect necessary documentation beforehand.
  • Negotiate vehicle prices and trade-in values..
  • Strive to meet sales targets.
  • Provide outstanding customer service throughout the sales process.
  • Address customer concerns and inquiries.

Qualifications and Skills:

  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
  • Knowledge of automotive features, specifications, and financing options.
  • Ability to build rapport with customers.
  • Sales-oriented mindset and a passion for automobiles.

REGARDS

NISHA

TEAM O3HIRE

MAIL ID- nisha.o3hire@gmail.com
